From: Heiko Mantel <contact@mais.informatik.tu-darmstadt.de>
The chair MAIS of Prof. Dr. Heiko Mantel at TU Darmstadt is offering
positions for Postdocs and Ph.D. candidates in the following areas:

  • Formal Modeling and Tool-supported Verification

  • Efficient and Reliable Run-time Monitoring and Enforcement

  • Static Side-channel Analysis and Mitigation

The positions are available immediately. Applications will be
considered until the positions have been taken. See

https://www.mais.informatik.tu-darmstadt.de/Positions.html

for more information on the positions and on how to apply.
